subject: Re: [junit] Thread
msgSnippet: Use the Self-Shunt design pattern... have your TestCase implement the Runnable interface. -- Stephen Smith, MEng (Wales). http://www.stephen-smith.co.uk/
messageBody:
Use the Self-Shunt design pattern... have your TestCase implement the
Runnable interface.
--
Stephen Smith, MEng (Wales).
http://www.stephen-smith.co.uk/

Brunno Silva wrote:
> I want to test a method that creates a new Thread. How
> can I do it?
